EmailTemplate.name: VNS_FusionePCR Integration with VisiCAD.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow's Webinar Reminder: Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Friendly Reminder - Tomorrow's Webinar Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
This is a reminder that you have registered for the "Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD" webinar. During this webinar you will take a closer look at how VisiCAD's integration with Fusion ePCR streamlines the collection of pre-hospital data both in the field and the office.
Another reminder email with your join link to the right, will be sent out tomorrow - 20 minutes before we start.
We look forward to having you attend!
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/ccmrrvb
DATE: Wednesday, October 26
TIME: 1 PM Eastern | Noon Central | 11 AM Mountain | 10 AM Pacific
Trouble Logging In? Call 800.799.4510 for the iLinc Support Team Help
Questions? Cheri Lane in TriTech Marketing (563) 387-4858 cheri.lane@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
